## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/cvrecord">CVRecord</a> is a fat pointer (base + size pair) to a symbol or type record.

Carrying the size separately instead of trusting the size stored in the record prefix provides some extra safety and flexibility.

Definition at line 29 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/codeview/cvrecord-h">CVRecord.h</a>.
